nl.sense_os.service.ctrl

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.sense_os.service.ctrl.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton that includes all the intelligent methods of the sense-android-library that define the function of specific sensors. The two different extensions, Default and Extended, implement the default and the energy-saving behavior respectively.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Controller getController(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a controller instance
      void scheduleTransmissions()
      Starts periodic transmission of the buffered sensor data.
